hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: destination_bucket_hash
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the git hash of the commit that changed the data set

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash source "/var/jenkins_home/workspace/Check For Updates/role_functions.sh"
### Build ETL Image aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${GIT_COMMIT}/pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz
HPDS_ETL_IMAGE=`docker load < ./pic-sure-hpds-etl.tar.gz | cut -d ' ' -f 3` echo $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE ls -alh `pwd`
mkdir -p local/hpds/ mkdir -p local/source/
### Pull data set to rekey. assume_role "arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/curated-datasets-s3-role" aws s3 cp ${source_s3_url} local/source/javabins.tar.gz
tar -xvzf local/source/javabins.tar.gz -C local/source
reset_role ### Move meta into local/hpds to include with new data set cp local/source/metadata.json local/hpds/
### Generate rekey encryption key to container's as local/hpds/encryption_key head /dev/urandom | tr -dc a-f0-9 | head -c 32 > "$WORKSPACE"/local/hpds/encryption_key
#### Execute rekey # volume mount pwd that contains original data files as /opt/local/source/ # docker run -i -v "${WORKSPACE}"/local:/opt/local -eLOADER_NAME=RekeyDataset $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE
### If destigmatized data set remove concepts if [ ${isDestigmatized} = 'true' ]; then
# RemoveConceptFromMetadata reads the rekeyed data set in /opt/local/hpds generated by the rekey. # add concepts to remove to /opt/local/hpds that contains the list of concepts to destigmatize cp local/source/conceptsToRemove.txt local/hpds/ docker run -i -v "${WORKSPACE}"/local:/opt/local -eLOADER_NAME=RemoveConceptFromMetadata $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE
fi
cd "$WORKSPACE"/local/hpds/
tar -cvzf ${output_file_name}.tar.gz *.javabin encryption_key metadata.json
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp ${output_file_name}.tar.gz s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/${output_file_name}.tar.gz --quiet
if [ -f metadata.json ]; then if [ ${isDestigmatized} = 'false' ]; then
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp metadata.json s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/fence_mapping.json --quiet
fi fi
